name: Snakebite
description: The Snakebite is a simple cocktail of equal parts lager and hard cider. The result is a refreshing combination of tart apple notes from the cider with malty grain character from the lager. The cocktail is so drinkable that bars sometimes refuse to serve it since it tends to lead to rapid intoxication.

recipeInstructions.text: Slowly pour beer into a pint glass tilted at a 45º angle. Stand the glass upright and wait for the beer to settle. Pour the cider directly on top of the beer.
